EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Quiz Taker that they've passed the module to continue to the next module
EmailTemplate.name: Quiz Pass Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Quiz Module Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Congratulations on passing the module! You may now continue on to the next module in the series. Reach out with your questions to trainers@homewise.org < mailto:trainers@homewise.org > or call us at 505-983-9473.
Keep up the good work!
Homewise Team
